title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 December 2012 - XWiki
content:

09:55 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:11 <vmassol> guys we need to release 4.4M1 today  
10:11 <vmassol> so we need to stabilize the functional tests ASAP  
10:18 <npm> has quit  
10:19 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
10:21 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
10:21 <npm> has quit  
10:22 <npm> has joined #xwiki

10:35 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:33 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:34 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:00 <jvdrean> has quit  
12:01 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
12:06 <vmassol> ok this commit should fix the quality bug introduced by thomas  
12:07 <vmassol> I'm now going to focus on functional tests after lunch  
12:10 <mflorea> has quit  
12:15 <tdelafoss> has joined #xwiki  
12:21 <vmassol> grr the build is failing on commons but passes locally  
12:30 <vmassol> sorry, I have to start a meeting now, bb in 1.5 hours  
12:31 <vmassol> I have no clue why commons build fails on CI and not locally ATM  
13:28 <jvelo> has quit  
13:59 <jvdrean> has quit  
14:46 <vmassol> hmmm  
14:46 <vmassol> the problem auto-repaired itself  
14:47 <vmassol> Enygma`: could you fix this please http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/2035/testReport/junit/org.xwiki.test.escaping/ApplicationTest/Main\_SolrSearch\_xml\_\_text\_\_fileType\_\_sort\_\_sortOrder\_\_debug\_\_space\_\_type\_\_lang\_\_rows\_\_queryString\_\_boost\_\_language\_\_comment\_\_firstIndex\_\_wiki\_\_end\_\_filter\_\_\_testParametersInColibri/ ?  
14:48 <vmassol> jvdrean1: could you fix this one please: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/2035/testReport/junit/org.xwiki.test.escaping/ApplicationTest/Panels\_PanelWizard\_xml\_\_queryString\_\_forceLeftPanels\_\_language\_\_place\_\_space\_\_comment\_\_forceRightPanels\_\_section\_\_\_testParametersInColibri/  
14:48 <vmassol> jvdrean1: error is:  
14:48 <vmassol> 10:09:09.734 [Thread-2] ERROR o.x.t.i.XWikiLogOutputStream - Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException  
14:48 <vmassol> 10:09:09.734 [Thread-2] ERROR o.x.t.i.XWikiLogOutputStream - at org.xwiki.panels.internal.AbstractPanelsUIExtensionManager.get(AbstractPanelsUIExtensionManager.java:94)  
14:49 <vmassol> guys, why don't you check functional tests regularly to see if what you've done is working?  
14:49 <vmassol> we should all do that every day  
14:49 <vmassol> and not wait till the RM tell us about it  
14:49 <jvdrean1> vmassol: I will be back tomorrow, I'm at smile marseille right now  
14:49 <vmassol> that's not good enough  
14:50 <vmassol> you could have fixed it earlier if you had checked!  
14:50 <vmassol> we're already late by 2 days  
14:50 <vmassol> same error on 4.3: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping-4.3/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/205/testReport/org.xwiki.test.escaping/ApplicationTest/Panels\_PanelWizard\_xml\_\_queryString\_\_forceLeftPanels\_\_language\_\_place\_\_space\_\_comment\_\_forceRightPanels\_\_section\_\_\_testParametersInColibri/  
14:51 <vmassol> let me know if you can do soemthing about it  
14:51 <vmassol> if not someone else will need to look at it  
14:51 <jvdrean1> vmassol: I will be back tomorrow, I'm at smile marseille right now  
14:52 <vmassol> not sure what smile is …. but I'm not fully similing ATM ;)  
14:52 <Enygma`> vmassol: looking at the Solr issue.  
14:52 <jvdrean1> vmassol: smile is a customer  
14:54 <vmassol> is marius on holidays too today?  
14:54 <vmassol> I spent the morning fixing thomas stuff and now I'm going to spend time on jv's and then there are extension stuff to fix....  
14:55 <vmassol> not a good day for me  
14:55 <vmassol> we need to find a strategy that makes dev look at functional tests results whenever they happen  
14:56 <vmassol> maybe we should really implement unbreakable builds  
15:58 <vmassol> jvdrean1: should be ok now  
16:08 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
16:10 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
16:26 <vmassol> arg one checkstyle violation  
16:26 <vmassol> I wonder why it built locally  
16:35 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
16:59 <msmeria> has quit  
17:17 <vmassol> mflorea: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/1288/testReport/org.apache.maven.surefire.junit4/JUnit4Provider/org\_xwiki\_test\_ui\_AllTests/ means that there was an xwiki server already started but not answering to a ping on Main.WebHome…. hmmm  
17:18 <mflorea> maybe there is a jetty instance on that agent that didn't close properly. Do you reproduce locally?  
17:18 <vmassol> no it doesn't reproduce locally  
17:19 <vmassol> the onyl reason is that the ping doesnt answer  
17:20 <mflorea> I see there is a jetty instance running on agent 2 although there is not job on it  
17:28 <vmassol> btw mflorea I got the following executing extension tests locally:  
17:28 <vmassol> https://gist.github.com/4260042  
17:30 <mflorea> testSimpleSearch is expected to fail, I need to update the test after a change made by sdumitriu  
17:30 <mflorea> I don't know why the rest fail  
17:30 <mflorea> I'll take a look later, now I'm investigating http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8575  
17:31 <vmassol> why isn't sdumitriu fixing it btw if he broke it?  
17:31 <vmassol> our release date was Monday so eveyroen should work to make that happen….  
17:31 <mflorea> don't know :)  
17:31 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ?  
17:32 <mflorea> but I just tried to install an extension on a 4.3 snapshot and I got some strange behavior, I'm afraid we have some regressions. I need to debug.  
17:34 <vmassol> ouch… ok  
17:34 <vmassol> Denis also noted some issues  
17:35 <mflorea> yes, I experience the same issues  
17:35 <mflorea> I'm going to debug after I understand what's wrong with http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8575  
17:36 <vmassol> mflorea: did you stop any process on agent2?  
17:37 <mflorea> no, I wanted to look at the log but I don't know how to determine the dir where jetty runs  
17:37 <vmassol> strange because it's not there anymore  
17:37 <mflorea> hmm  
17:38 <vmassol> hmm we shut it down at the end of the build  
17:38 <mflorea> I can see it  
17:38 <vmassol> but then you said you noticed it was up after that build had finished  
17:38 <vmassol> ah?  
17:39 <mflorea> 500        409 15.0  6.5 1932712 552680 ?      Sl   Dec07 841:13 java -Xmx512m -XX:MaxPermSize=128m -Dxwiki.data.dir=data -Djetty.port=8080 -Djetty.home=jetty -DSTOP.KEY=xwiki -DSTOP.PORT=8079 -Dfile.encoding=UTF8 -Dorg.eclipse.jetty.server.Request.maxFormContentSize=1000000 -jar jetty/start.jar  
17:53 <jvdrean1> has quit  
17:59 <Enygma`> vmassol: can I stop the current xwiki-platform build and restart it? so it can also build by just-pushed fix for the solr escaping issue?  
18:00 <Enygma`> s/by/my/  
18:03 <vmassol> Enygma`: ok  
18:04 <vmassol> the only danger when doing this  
18:04 <vmassol> is to leave a stray xwiki server running  
18:04 <vmassol> but the likelihood is small and I think it should get stopped anyway  
18:04 <vmassol> actually i don't really know how jenkins stops a job  
18:04 <Enygma`> done: waiting for the result of http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/3039/  
18:04 <vmassol> would be interesting to research that

21:22 <vmassol> sdumitriu: please don't commit on master except for fixing bugs  
21:22 <vmassol> we need to stabilize the release and release it  
21:22 <vmassol> you have some tests that you broke to fix too sdumitriu :)  
21:22 <vmassol> (see above today)  
21:23 <vmassol> when you changed commons net did you rebuild the full build including all functional tests?  
21:23 <vmassol> if not then it's potentially an issue for the release  
21:23 <vmassol> I'm feeling very lonely  
21:23 <vmassol> seems nobody cares about the release

22:14 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki
